meanings.definition: Make (something) true or accurate, especially in alignment.
meanings.sent1: She spent hours truing the bicycle wheel to make sure it spun smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic is truing the car's wheels to ensure they are aligned correctly.
meanings.sent3: While truing the compass, he accidentally pointed it towards the North Pole.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to truing the facts made her a reliable source of information.
meanings.sent5: Truing the edges of the puzzle pieces made it easier to fit them together.
